doc.name: SequenceToMatrix
doc.description: This actor bundles a specified number of input tokens into a matrix. On each firing, it reads rows times columns input tokens and writes one output matrix token with the specified number of rows and columns. This actor is polymorphic. It can accept inputs of any scalar type that has a corresponding matrix type.
doc.author: Edward Lee
doc.property: The number of rows in the output. This is an integer that defaults to 1.
The number of columns in the output. This is an integer that defaults to 1.
